content: As you leave the tunnel, you'll spot a peculiar yet familiar site -- that same old rat who was spotted in the Forest of Wolves is lurking around here too, and quickly darts away.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
As you leave the tunnel, you'll spot a peculiar yet familiar site -- that same old rat who was spotted in the Forest of Wolves is lurking around here too, and quickly darts away.
